articles.author: William Gavin
articles.title: As Tesla’s stock falls, Elon Musk brushes off Nvidia’s competitive threat - MarketWatch
articles.description: Nvidia is ramping up its work on driverless-vehicle technology, a field dominated by Tesla and a few others. But Musk doesn’t see an imminent reason to worry.
articles.content:
Nvidia is making a bid to challenge the dominance of Tesla and a handful of others in the autonomous-vehicle business. For now, Tesla CEO Elon Musk says he isnt worried.
Im not losing any sleep abou… [+113 chars]
